verses.text_plain: Deliver me, O Lord, from the evil man: preserve me from the violent man;
verses.verse_html:
1Deliver me, O Lord, from the evil man: preserve me from the violent man; ▼
▼ violent…: Heb. man of violences

footnotes.body_html: ▼ violent…: Heb. man of violences

verses.text_plain: Which imagine mischiefs in their heart; continually are they gathered together for war.
verses.verse_html: 2Which imagine mischiefs in their heart; continually are they gathered together for war.

verses.text_plain: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent; adders’ poison is under their lips. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 3They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent; adders’ poison is under their lips. Selah.

verses.text_plain: Keep me, O Lord, from the hands of the wicked; preserve me from the violent man; who have purposed to overthrow my goings.
verses.verse_html: 4Keep me, O Lord, from the hands of the wicked; preserve me from the violent man; who have purposed to overthrow my goings.

verses.text_plain: The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; they have spread a net by the wayside; they have set gins for me. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 5The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; they have spread a net by the wayside; they have set gins for me. Selah.

verses.text_plain: I said unto the Lord, Thou art my God: hear the voice of my supplications, O Lord.
verses.verse_html: 6I said unto the Lord, Thou art my God: hear the voice of my supplications, O Lord.

verses.text_plain: O God the Lord, the strength of my salvation, thou hast covered my head in the day of battle.
verses.verse_html: 7O God the Lord, the strength of my salvation, thou hast covered my head in the day of battle.

verses.text_plain: Grant not, O Lord, the desires of the wicked: further not his wicked device; lest they exalt themselves. Selah.
verses.verse_html:
8Grant not, O Lord, the desires of the wicked: further not his wicked device; lest they exalt themselves. Selah. ▼
▼ lest…: or, let them not be exalted

footnotes.body_text: ▼ lest…: or, let them not be exalted
footnotes.body_html: ▼ lest…: or, let them not be exalted

verses.text_plain: As for the head of those that compass me about, let the mischief of their own lips cover them.
verses.verse_html: 9As for the head of those that compass me about, let the mischief of their own lips cover them.

tokens.text: of those that compass me about

verses.text_plain: Let burning coals fall upon them: let them be cast into the fire; into deep pits, that they rise not up again.
verses.verse_html: 10Let burning coals fall upon them: let them be cast into the fire; into deep pits, that they rise not up again.

tokens.text: upon them: let them be cast
that they rise not up again

verses.text_plain: Let not an evil speaker be established in the earth: evil shall hunt the violent man to overthrow him.
verses.verse_html:
11Let not an evil speaker be established in the earth: evil shall hunt the violent man to overthrow him. ▼
▼ an…: or, an evil speaker (Heb. a man of tongue), a wicked man of violence, be established in the earth: let him be hunted to his overthrow

footnotes.body_text: ▼ an…: or, an evil speaker (Heb. a man of tongue), a wicked man of violence, be established in the earth: let him be hunted to his overthrow
footnotes.body_html: ▼ an…: or, an evil speaker (Heb. a man of tongue), a wicked man of violence, be established in the earth: let him be hunted to his overthrow

verses.text_plain: I know that the Lord will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and the right of the poor.
verses.verse_html: 12I know that the Lord will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and the right of the poor.

verses.text_plain: Surely the righteous shall give thanks unto thy name: the upright shall dwell in thy presence.
verses.verse_html: 13Surely the righteous shall give thanks unto thy name: the upright shall dwell in thy presence.
